nodes.text: Nivi'sec was a male Twi'lek living during the Galactic War. By 3640 BBY he was a top man in Rogun Matt'rik's crime syndicate. When Rogun Matt'rik's fortress on Tatooine was attacked by the Voidhound, Nivi'sec chose not to engage the smuggler in combat and hid behind some crates to sit out the fighting instead.

Nivi'sec appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Smuggler class mission on Tatooine only if the player makes the Dark Side choice to kill Rogun. In that case, he offers himself to be the smuggler's new informant and distributor and informs that Darmas Pollaran and Bevera Dodonna have gone off with Harridax Kirill to Corellia. In the lightside option the player spares Rogun, who provides all that information himself.
